tool_description: Identifies and categorizes textual differences between multiple versions of the same scriptural passage, highlighting variations in wording, additions, and omissions.

reference_text.description: The base text to compare against

comparison_texts.description: Array of texts to compare with the reference

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: comparison_texts and comparison_labels must have the same length.
Empty reference text: Reference text cannot be empty.
Empty comparison array: At least one comparison text is required.
Invalid sensitivity level: Use one of [high, medium, low].
Text too short for analysis: Provide texts with at least 5 words for meaningful comparison.
usage: Provide a reference text and array of comparison texts with labels. Adjust sensitivity and case/punctuation handling as needed. Returns detailed variant analysis.

total_variants.description: Total number of textual variants identified

variant_types.description: Types of variants found (addition, omission, substitution)

similarity_scores.description: Similarity scores between reference and each comparison
